name: J Medical (Bidadari ・ Baby & Children ・ GP Clinic)

reviews.text: Dr Jowell has been my son's primary doctor since birth. He is incredibly patient, always takes the time to answer my questions thoroughly, and never makes appointments feel rushed. His dedication and genuine concern for his patients truly set him apart. The clinic staff is also warm and welcoming, making each visit a pleasant experience. Highly recommend Dr Jowell for anyone looking for a compassionate and knowledgeable doctor!

Just below block 212A of the new Bidadari estate Woodleigh Hillside, is this really nice clinic by Dr. Jowell. Talk about a really friendly doctor who genuinely cares about your health and gives very targeted advice for what ails you. He also has a friendly check in staff. Try this clinic and you know you be coming back every time you need to see a doctor when you need one.

Doctor Jowell is very friendly and he knows how to interact with young kids. Was pretty surprise with his preparation when he needs to deal with young children. He got a dinosaur sticker for my 3 years old boy so that my boy is more comfortable and ready. It also help him to ease his stress and anxiety which is a very normal feeling we have when we need to see a doctor, but he take extra steps in helping the children not to feel stress and less worried.

He also gives very professional consultation and check on the patient’s needs before he offer his opinion. He is also concerned about ours concern as a parent. He affirm us what we need to do and to avoid doing.
Thank you for the heart for your patient, we truly appreciate that!

Clinic closes at 2, but registration closes 130pm, which isn't stated anywhere online. Infant running high fever. Reached at 133pm but was told "tmr morning can or not? Otherwise if serious you go hospital la". So much for compassionate primary care!

Edit: worst part is the doctor was the one who decided to turn us away!

This clinic is really good. Sign in is seamless just use SingPass, see doctor very fast, the staff are friendly and helpful and the doctor also very nice + gave good, clear, advice. Thanks Dr. Jowell and team, it was a great experience. We will make this our default clinic to go to!
